summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.3°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.0°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 625 m) and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1575 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 3943 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, very clammy and humid and near calm conditions. A few light raindrops may fall, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and bright intervals likely. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
